dt: {bc}to get or catch {d_link|sight|sight:1} of (someone or something) again

dt.t: The use of these bands has allowed the community of biologists (and the public) to {wi}resight{/wi} these birds over time …, [Bryan] Watts said.

dt: {bc}to aim (something) again by means of a sight {dx_def}see {dxt|sight:1||8a}{/dx_def}

dt.t: The [unidentified] professional hunter … had had enough. {ldquo}Tom,{rdquo} he said sweetly, {ldquo}I think you should {wi}resight{/wi} your rifle again. … {rdquo}
One can … calculate how long a single shooter would take to shoot, reload, {wi}resight{/wi}, shoot again …

shortdef: to sight again or anew: such as
to get or catch sight of (someone or something) again
to aim (something) again by means of a sight
